title: Hour 1 -  Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
itunes:title: Hour 1 -  Doug Gottlieb & TJ Houshmandzadeh Guest Hosting
description:
With Doug and TJ filling in for Dan.  They discuss the Baker Mayfield trade to the Panthers, the timing of it, and how Baker fits into that offense. NFL Network Reporter/Insider Mike Garafolo joins TJ and Doug to talk about the Baker Mayfield deal, what happens with Jimmy Garappollo in San Francisco, and all of the other main NFL Headlines this week. The Nets are reportedly not getting as much interest in Kevin Durant from other teams as they had expected, the guys talk about that. 

#DougGottliebShow   #UpOnGame 

 

 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
